attributes.action: implement meaningful acceptable grammar checking error messages on all petitions to No.10
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
languages are a branch of mathematics and it is possible to formally define their structure and use this to teach people to better express themselves within that structure.
Your error message 'impossible to understand' is like something out of a 1970's home computer when we hold a Turing Test on the backup to the No.10 petitions site

rejection.details: We are unable to amend the text on petitions - therefore we need to reject certain petitions as the public will find them too difficult to understand.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
